Public NotInheritable Class ParallelForEach(Of T) Inherits NativeActivity
generic <typename T> public ref class ParallelForEach sealed : System::Activities::NativeActivity

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 在 集合中提供的值型別。

span.span: The type of the values provided in the collection.

summary.span: 列舉集合項目，並針對集合的每個項目平行執行內嵌陳述式。

span.span: Enumerates the elements of a collection and executes an embedded statement for each element of the collection in parallel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 內嵌陳述式會一起進行排程並以非同步方式執行，但是除非排程的活動本身也是非同步的 (例如訊息活動、 或衍生自 的活動)，否則它們不會在個別的執行緒上執行，因此每個後續活動都只會在先前排程的活動完成或閒置時才會執行。The embedded statements are scheduled together and run asynchronously, but unless the scheduled activites themselves are asynchronous (such as messaging activities, , or activities that derive from ), they do not run on separate threads, so each successive activity will only execute when the previously scheduled activity completes or goes idle. 如果此活動沒有非同步或閒置的子活動，則會使用與執行 活動相同的方式來執行此活動。If none of the child activities of this activity are asynchronous or go idle, this activity execute in the same way that a activity does. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何建立 活動。The following code sample demonstrates creating a activity. 這個範例取自[公司購買程序](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/corporate-purchase-process.md)範例。This example is from the [Corporate Purchase Process](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/corporate-purchase-process.md) sample. [!code-csharp[wfs_PurchaseProcess#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wfs_purchaseprocess/cs/purchaseprocessworkflow.cs#1)]

summary.span: 在每個反覆運算完成之後評估。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果評估為 `true`，則會取消已排程的擱置中反覆運算。If it evaluates to `true`, then the scheduled pending iterations are canceled. 如果並未設定此屬性，則會執行所有已排程的陳述式，直到完成為止。If this property is not set, all scheduled statements execute until completion.
